mapper.select: SELECT FEED_ID, GROUP_ID, FEED_AUTHOR, FEED_TITLE, FEED_CONTENT, FEED_UPLOAD_DATE, FEED_EVENT_DATE, FEED_LOCATION FROM HOME_SNS.FEED ORDER BY FEED_UPLOAD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT USER_SEQ as userSeq, USER_ID as userId, USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NICKNAME as userNickname, USER_PHONE as userPhone, USER_BOD as userBod, USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as userProfileImageUrl,USER_REGISTER_DATE as userRegisterDate, USER_CLS as userCls FROM USER WHERE USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED ( GROUP_ID , FEED_AUTHOR, FEED_TITLE, FEED_CONTENT, FEED_UPLOAD_DATE, FEED_EVENT_DATE, FEED_LOCATION ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{author}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{eventDate} , #{location} )
INSERT INTO FILE ( FEED_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_URL, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl}, now() )
INSERT INTO HASHTAG ( FEED_ID, HASHTAG_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE HOME_SNS.FEED SET FEED_TITLE = #{feedTitle}, FEED_CONTENT = #{feedContent}, FEED_EVENT_DATE = #{feedEventDate}, FEED_LOCATION = #{feedLocation} WHERE FEED_ID = #{feedId}
